subject: Really wierd.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I was pulling two cables under one of the schools this afternoon. I had them 
stretched out about 100feet, I went back to pull a little more , and here's 
this strip if plastic tied around each of the cables, not just tangled, 
neatly tied, and I know for fact that I was the only one down there. Both 
sides were tied in two half hitches, I would think that would be impossible 
to happen by chance. I told "them" that was a good joke!



Frank
